author: Redjumpman (Redjumpman#1337)
install_msg:
Thank you for installing pokedex. Be sure to check out the wiki here: https://github.com/Redjumpman/Jumper-Plugins/wiki/Pokedex-RedV3
This cog comes bundled with two CSV files for pokemon data.
name: Pokedex
description: View standard pokemon information, Movesets, TM learn-sets, search items, and pokemon locations.
